Other features of Gillespie syndrome can include abnormalities in the bones of the spine (vertebrae) and malformations of the heart.",GHR,Gillespie syndrome
How many people are affected by Gillespie syndrome ?,The prevalence of Gillespie syndrome is unknown. Only a few dozen affected individuals have been described in the medical literature. It has
